snippet.title: Project 4: New Light City Story Teaser
snippet.description:
Project 4: New Light City is a third person, narrative driven psychological thriller where choices matter, deductive reasoning is crucial, and indecision is punished. 

You play as Max Boston, the Special Investigator charged with uncovering the driving force behind a murder-suicide crisis in a futuristic, otherwise idyllic New Light City. If anyone can do it, it’s Max…as long as he can overcome the demons from a tragic past that plague him.

Steam Page Coming June 30, 2021

https://twitter.com/CatchLightInte1
https://discord.com/invite/NBb7JwmkCY
https://www.catchlightinteractive.com
